short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save content for later and view it on new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pantry is your ultimate tool for saving and organizing content you find online. With Pantry, you can effortlessly collect links, images, text, and more, keeping everything in one convenient place. Whether you’re doing research, saving favorite recipes, or just keeping track of interesting articles, Pantry makes it easy to store and access your content whenever you need it.

Features:

- Save Anything: Collect links, images, and text from any webpage with a simple right-click context menu.
- Quick Access: Open your saved items from the extension’s popup or set Pantry as your new tab page for instant access.
- Organize Efficiently: Automatically categorize your saved items for easy retrieval and management.
- Customizable Experience: Choose whether to set Pantry as your new tab page or access your items directly from the popup.
- Secure and Private: All your data is stored locally in your browser, ensuring your privacy is protected.

How to Use:

- Save Content: Right-click on any link, image, or selected text and choose "Save to Pantry."
- View Saved Items: Click on the Pantry icon in the Chrome toolbar to open the popup and view your saved items or access the full Pantry page.
- Organize: Use the built-in categories or add your own to keep your content organized.

Pantry is designed to be a seamless part of your browsing experience, helping you save, organize, and retrieve your content effortlessly.
